parameters.name: weaviate_version
parameters.description: Select the Weaviate version to use.

options.name: v1.34.0
options.description: See release notes at hhttps://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/releases/tag/v1.34.0

options.name: v1.33.4
options.description: See release notes at hhttps://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/releases/tag/v1.33.4

options.name: v1.32.16
options.description: See release notes at hhttps://github.com/weaviate/weaviate/releases/tag/v1.32.16

parameters.name: weaviate_volume
parameters.description: How should Weaviate's data be persisted?

options.name: named-volume
options.description: Docker will create a named volume called weaviate_data.

options.name: host-binding
options.description: Docker will mount ./weaviate_data on the host to the container.

options.name: no-volume
options.description: Not recommended: Data may be lost on container restart.

parameters.name: local_modules
parameters.description:
Enable locally-run model integrations.
(All API-based model provider integrations are enabled by default.)

options.name: text2vec-transformers
options.description: Text embeddings (transformers library).

options.name: text2vec-ollama
options.description: Ollama embeddings

options.name: text2vec-model2vec
options.description: Static Model2vec embeddings

options.name: multi2vec-clip
options.description: Multimodal CLIP embeddings (transformers library)

options.name: reranker-transformers
options.description: Rerank search results using a local transformers model.

options.name: generative-ollama
options.description: Generative AI models (ollama)

parameters.name: transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the specific model for the text2vec-transformers module.

options.name: google-gemma-3-300m-embedding-1.13.2
options.description: A good modern model for most use cases.

options.name: eurobert-eurobert-2.1b
options.description: A good modern model for most use cases.

options.name: sentence-transformers-paraphrase-multilingual-MiniLM-L12-v2
options.description: Recommended for multilingual use cases.

parameters.name: model2vec_model
parameters.description: Select the specific model for the text2vec-model2vec module.

parameters.name: reranker_transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the reranker-transformers module.

options.name: cross-encoder-ms-marco-MiniLM-L-6-v2
options.description: Trained on MS Marco Passage Ranking task.

options.name: cross-encoder-ms-marco-TinyBERT-L-2-v2
options.description: A smaller, faster model for passage ranking.

parameters.name: t2v_transformers_cuda
parameters.description: Enable CUDA for the text2vec-transformers module.

options.name: enabled
options.description: Requires an NVIDIA GPU on the host machine.

parameters.name: reranker_transformers_cuda
parameters.description: Enable CUDA for the reranker-transformers module.

options.name: enabled
options.description: Requires an NVIDIA GPU on the host machine.

parameters.name: multi2vec_clip_model
parameters.description: Select the model for the multi2vec-clip module.

options.name: google-siglip2-so400m-patch16-512
options.description: SigLIP 2 model with 512x512 input size (Multilingual, 1152d)

options.name: google-siglip2-so400m-patch16-384
options.description: SigLIP 2 model with 384x384 input size (Multilingual, 1152d)

options.name: sentence-transformers-clip-ViT-B-32
options.description: Texts must be in English. (English, 768d)

options.name: sentence-transformers-clip-ViT-B-32-multilingual-v1
options.description: Supports a wide variety of languages for text. (Multilingual, 768d)

options.name: openai-clip-vit-base-patch16
options.description: Uses a ViT-B/16 Transformer architecture.

options.name: ViT-B-16-laion2b_s34b_b88k
options.description: ViT-B/16 Transformer trained with LAION-2B dataset using OpenCLIP.

options.name: ViT-B-32-quickgelu-laion400m_e32
options.description: ViT-B/32 Transformer trained with LAION-400M dataset using OpenCLIP.

options.name: xlm-roberta-base-ViT-B-32-laion5b_s13b_b90k
options.description: ViT-B/32 xlm roberta base model trained with LAION-5B dataset using OpenCLIP.

parameters.name: multi2vec_clip_cuda
parameters.description: Enable CUDA for the multi2vec-clip module.

options.name: enabled
options.description: Requires an NVIDIA GPU on the host machine.
